description: This file is a C header file (.h) defining interfaces for map data model related to Rbus in the RdkEasyMeshController component. It declares function prototypes for retrieving ALE and radio information, as well as initializing and finalizing the Rbus connection.

methods.name: map_dm_rbus_get_ale
methods.description: Retrieves ALE information at a specified index.

methods.name: map_dm_rbus_get_radio
methods.description: Retrieves radio information associated with a specific ALE.

methods.name: map_dm_rbus_init
methods.description: Initializes the Rbus subsystem for the component.

methods.name: map_dm_rbus_fini
methods.description: Finalizes and cleans up the Rbus subsystem.
